summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Sections 13C.2, 13C.3, 15.24, 16.1, 17.1, 17.21, 17A.1, 23.1 and 23.41 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) and adding a new Section 23.31 to said Ordinance to implement the offstreet parking policies for Downtown Seattle expressed in Resolution No. 24957.
